text: The 2018 Fresno FC season is the club's first season in the United Soccer League, the second tier of the American soccer pyramid. == Current squad == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! style="background:#B4CCE4; color:#FFFFFF;" scope="col"|No. ! style="background:#B4CCE4; color:#FFFFFF;" scope="col"|Position ! style="background:#B4CCE4; color:#FFFFFF;" scope="col"|Player ! style="background:#B4CCE4; color:#FFFFFF;" scope="col"|Nation |- |} == Transfers == === In === {| class="wikitable sortable" style="width:90%; text-align:center; font-size:95%; text- align:left;" |- !No. !Pos. !Player !Transferred from !Fee !Date !Source |- |} === Out === {| class="wikitable sortable" style="width:90%; text-align:center; font-size:95%; text-align:left;" |- !No. !Pos. !Player !Transferred to !Fee !Date !Source |- |} == Friendlies == === Preseason === === Postseason === Source:http://www.fresnofc.com/news_article/show/887425?referrer_id=3067476 == Competitions == === USL === ==== Table ==== ==== Results ==== === U.S. Open Cup === == Statistics == == See also == * Fresno FC * 2018 in American soccer * 2018 USL season == References == == External links == Category:Fresno FC seasons Fresno FC
